EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering! Please see event details below.
Date & Time: Thursday, July 7th, 9:00 AM—3:30 PM Location: COM’SQUARE, 57 Esplanade du Général de Gaulle, 92081 Paris La Défense cedex
{{my.Save the Date Paris}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/events]]>.
